levels.description:
When skill is activated, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> and gain one of the following effects at random: Every attack reduces the target's ASPD by <@ba.vup>{nothin_s_2[a][attack_speed_down].attack_speed}</> (Lasts for <@ba.vup>{nothin_s_2[a][attack_speed_down].duration}</> seconds and does not stack); ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>; Gain <@ba.vup>+{prob:0%}</> Physical Dodge and Block <@ba.vup>+{block_cnt}</>
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration, can manually deactivate skill</>;

<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration, can manually deactivate skill</>;
